item.title: HP Envy X360 SSD Replacement
item.description: Never Enough Storage When purchased, my laptop came equipped with a spinning HDD. After about a year of use, the HDD started going bad. I replaced it with a 500 GB Crucial 2.5 SSD. Fast forward another year and storage space was starting to get low. Lucky for me during ‘Black Friday week’ I saw a 1 TB Samsung 860 EVO SSD on sale for $127.00. This would give me some extra stroage and allow me to revive my aging desktop by repurposing the 500 GB SSD.
